name: Hell's Pinball
description:
A pinball'em up with a few RPG elements.

The aim of the game is to keep your lifecore safe from waves of demons,  for this you must hit them in a pinball game. When you kill an enemy or hit a button you gain points that can be trade for upgrades or extra balls.

The game is not totally done yet, so keep calm and expect some bugs. 

Instructions:

Z - Left flipper

.  - Right flipper

Space - Pull back plunger

1,2,3,4 - Upgrades/Extra ball
